attributes.action: Stop destroying Islamic Heritage in Saudi Arabia
attributes.additional_details:
The Saudi government over the years has been destroying the Islamic Heritage sites in Saudi Arabia. This petition is to stop the demolishment of the birth place of the Prophet Muhammad (pbuh). The birth place should not be destroyed but preserved for both Muslims and Non-Muslims around the world so that they have the opportunity to view the place where the Prophet Muhammad (pbuh) was born.

Please forward the petition to family and friends both Muslims and Non-Muslims so together we can stop this from happening.
